column1: What is JUnit primarily used for?, "Integration testing", "Unit testing", "System testing", "Acceptance testing", "B"
Which annotation is used to mark a test method in JUnit 5?, "@JUnit", "@Run", "@Test", "@Check", "C"
Which assertion checks if two values are equal in JUnit 5?, "assertFalse()", "assertTrue()", "assertEquals()", "assertSame()", "C"
Which import is required to use JUnit 5 assertions?, "import junit.framework.*;", "import org.junit.jupiter.api.*;", "import org.junit.runner.*;", "import org.junit.api.*;", "B"
What does `@BeforeEach` do in JUnit 5?, "Runs after all test methods", "Runs before all test methods", "Runs before each test method", "Runs after each test method", "C"
Which JUnit 5 method fails a test intentionally?, "assertFail()", "terminate()", "fail()", "assertFalse()", "C"
Which annotation is used to disable a test?, "@Disabled", "@Ignore", "@Skip", "@Disable", "A"
Which exception is expected in `assertThrows()`?, "NullPointerException", "ArithmeticException", "Specified exception", "Any exception", "C;D"
How can you group multiple test cases in JUnit 5?, "@Suite", "@Nested", "@TestGroup", "@TestBundle", "B"
What is the function of `assertNotNull()`?, "Fails the test", "Checks if an object is null", "Checks if an object is not null", "Skips the test", "C"
